work.name: nLine
work.summary: Developed innovative sensing and data analytics methods to enhance situational awareness, investment targeting, and impact evaluation for electric grids in Sub-Saharan Africa. Collaborated with diverse partners, including academics and utilities, and secured multiple research grants.

work.name: International Energy Agency

work.name: PingThings
work.summary: Led PingThings' data science team to develop transmission monitoring tools leveraging novel high resolution sensors, high performance data storage and access systems, and innovative algorithms for large American utilities. I also led execution and delivery of a large Department of Energy research grant on applications of machine learning for power systems event detection.
